definition: suffix of a noun of locality
along/to follow (a line, tradition etc)/to carry on/to trim (a border with braid, tape etc)/border/edge

sentences.english: The lines remain over the trailing edges during the entire rotation.
sentences.chinese: 线在整个平转过程中保持在风筝边沿的上面。

sentences.english: Tony smiled to himself and drummed his fingers on the edge of the table.
sentences.chinese: 托尼暗自笑了一下，然后用手指在桌子边沿敲了起来。

sentences.english: The application of this type of double-edge-triggered flip-flop in seq…
sentences.chinese: 文章还介绍了该双边沿触发器在时序电路中的应用。

sentences.english: In paper manufacture the lip gap at the headbox determines the thickness of the paper.
sentences.chinese: 造纸工业中，流浆箱的出口边沿间隙决定纸张的厚度。

sentences.english: With adim triumph, she trims the swimming-suit rim at the swimming-pool brim.
sentences.chinese: 她带着暗淡的喜悦在泳池边整顿泳装的边沿。

sentences.english: The beautiful garden was edged with flowering trees.
sentences.chinese: 那个美丽的花园的边沿栽种着树木，树上繁花盛开。

sentences.english: I reached for him while still on my knees and then turned to rest my back against the side of the tub.
sentences.chinese: 我中跪着伸手去抓它，然后躺在池子的边沿上休息。

sentences.english: My soul goes out in a longing to touch the skirt of the dim distance.
sentences.chinese: 我的灵魂在极想中走出，要往摸触幽暗的远处的边沿。

sentences.english: A box-like device into which card modules can be positioned. The back of the cage has sets of edge connectors.
sentences.chinese: 可安放插件模块的机架，其后面有边沿插接件。

sentences.english: Dooku gripped the edge of the table. It was clear that a great surge of rage had overtaken him.
sentences.chinese: 杜库的手紧抓住桌子边沿，很明显他被激怒了。

sentences.english: The rims of the end part of the spiral shaft and a main spiral middle part are respectively provided with a straw cutter.
sentences.chinese: 在螺旋轴尾部及主螺旋中部边沿分别有一断草刀。

sentences.english: Cups of bottom border chisel three beast hoof foot, etc. Distance divide the work, is decorated with the line beasts.
sentences.chinese: 樽底边沿琢三个兽蹄足等距分工，并饰有兽面纹。

sentences.english: This narrow strip verges against the road.
sentences.chinese: 这条狭长的地带构成了公路的边沿。

sentences.english: You should teeter on the brink of failure.
sentences.chinese: 你会在失败的边沿摇摇欲坠地行走。

sentences.english: Perhaps the most interesting part of the real bill is the border.
sentences.chinese: 也许真钞最有趣的部分是它的边沿。

sentences.english: When saving others must rescue in the building border rubble first survivor.
sentences.chinese: 救人时要先抢救建筑物边沿瓦砾中的幸存者。

definition: to hang in the air/suspended in midair/(fig.) uncertain
